snippet.title: Slap City's FULL RELEASE on September 17th! + An EXTRA surprise!
snippet.description:
Slap City will reach version 1.0 on this Thursday the 17th! That means leaving Steam early access as it's now a full release! Get the game here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/725480/Slap_City/

Besides things like adding Asha's Story Mode and 3 new Versus Stages, this full release also adds an EXTRA surprise... This update also means that it will go to fullpriced 20$ for anyone buying it new, though until the 17th you can still get it for 9,99$ in the days leading up to the full release. Should we release any further characters they are planned to be free updates 

For more info about this release https://store.steampowered.com/newshub/app/725480/view/4041374038296699069

Slap City Discord: https://discord.gg/slapcity
Ludosity Discord: https://discord.gg/ludosity
Ludosity Twitter: https://twitter.com/ludosity
